meanings.sent1: The baby bird made a gulpy noise while trying to swallow the worm.
meanings.sent2: The gulpy sound of the water flowing down the drain was soothing.
meanings.sent3: The gulpy noise coming from the old pipes sounded like a tiny frog.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was so gulpy, it echoed through the room.
meanings.sent5: The gulpy sound of the soda being poured into the glass was refreshing.

meanings.sent1: The gulpy fish quickly swallowed the bait.
meanings.sent2: His gulpy eating habits made him finish his meal in record time.
meanings.sent3: The gulpy dog drank water so fast it spilled all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The gulpy manner in which he spoke showed his excitement.
meanings.sent5: The gulpy movements of the frog catching insects were fascinating to watch.

meanings.sent1: She gulped down the water in a gulpy manner after the long run.
meanings.sent2: The hungry child gulped his food so fast it made him hiccup.
meanings.sent3: He gulped the lemonade so gulpy that it went up his nose.
meanings.sent4: The news was so shocking, it made him gulp gulpy.
meanings.sent5: The suspense in the movie made her gulp gulpy in anticipation.
